application.doc: Retrieving all current certificate database names

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the certificate database names with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the SSL Certificates resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: DockerretrieveSslCertNamesJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of file. This information is the last modified time of the file. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

param.name: description
param.doc: The description that is set for this certificate database.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
